net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.configuration
Class AbstractConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.configuration.AbstractConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration
Direct Known Subclasses:
PropertiesConfiguration, SystemPropertyConfiguration
public abstract class AbstractConfiguration
extends Object
implements Configuration

Abstract implementation of a configuration that supports a parent configuration.

The parent configuration is used to lookup keys whenever this configuration does not support a specific key.

Version:
1.7 (2008/03/30 12:43:19)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.3.0

Method Detail

hasValue

public boolean hasValue(String key)
Description copied from interface: Configuration
Check if the configuration supports the specified key.

Specified by:
hasValue in interface Configuration
Implementation Notes:
Delegates to the parent configuration or returns false if there is no parent configuration.
Parameters:
key - the key to check.
Returns:
true if the specified key is supported, false otherwise.
Since:
1.3.0

Description copied from interface: Configuration
Lists all configuration keys with the specified prefix.

Specified by:
listKeys in interface Configuration
Implementation Notes:
Delegates to the parent configuration or returns an empty array if there is no parent configuration.
Parameters:
prefix - the prefix for all keys to list.
Returns:
the list of configuration entries with the given prefix.

getBoolean

public final boolean getBoolean(String key,
                                boolean defaultValue)
Description copied from interface: Configuration
Retrieves a boolean value for the specified key.

Specified by:
getBoolean in interface Configuration
Implementation Notes:
Delegates to the getString(String, String) and parses the result, returns the defaultValue if there is no string value for the key. Parsing is done using Boolean.valueOf(String).
Parameters:
key - the key of the value to retrieve.
defaultValue - the default value if the key cannot be found.
Returns:
the boolean value.
Since:
1.3.0

getStringList

public final String[] getStringList(String key,
                                    String[] defaultValue)
Description copied from interface: Configuration
Retrieves a an array of Strings for the specified key.

Specified by:
getStringList in interface Configuration
Implementation Notes:
Delegates to the getString(String, String) and parses the result, returns the defaultValue if there is no string value for the key. Parsing is done by splitting the value string using the comma , as delimiter, escaping of commas is currently not supported.
Parameters:
key - the key of the value to retrieve.
defaultValue - the default value if the key cannot be found.
Returns:
the array of Strings.
Since:
1.3.0
